message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe you might find valuable. I'm thinking of a price around $145. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product and I'm willing to pay up to $130 for it.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but I'm looking to get a bit closer to $140. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $135?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $132 for the product.
